title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 362-2.6 - Health plan contact information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 362-2.6 - Health plan contact information

State Regulations
(a) Health maintenance organizations and participating insurers shall submit to the superintendent: (1)
the name, address and telephone number of a health plan contact person assigned to the Healthy New York Program; (2)
the address and toll-free telephone number to direct consumer inquiries regarding the Healthy New York Program; and
(3)
the service area in which the Healthy New York Program will be available. Any revisions or updates to such information shall be submitted to the superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
362-2.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
